definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The Lord stretched out His arms, and I saw His nail-pierced hands.
sentences.chinese: 主伸出他的臂膀，我看到他那釘痕的雙手。

sentences.english: He was a murderer whose hands reeked with blood.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個雙手沾滿鮮血的殺人犯。

sentences.english: Treat them with a special hand cream.
sentences.chinese: 用特別的護手霜來呵護雙手。

sentences.english: Start by lying on the floor, with your hands by your sides.
sentences.chinese: 仰臥於地板上，把雙手放在身體兩側。

sentences.english: Secure all work with clamps or a vise, freeing both hands to operate tools.
sentences.chinese: 使用夾鉗或虎鉗固定工件，以便空出雙手來操作工具。

sentences.english: Psionicists are limited to light armor and can use daggers and two -handed staffs.
sentences.chinese: 心靈術士僅能裝備輕甲並可使用匕首和雙手杖。

sentences.english: Who is using the hard-working hands, as we have built a happy home?
sentences.chinese: 是誰用勤勞的雙手，爲我們營造一個溫馨的家園？

sentences.english: We think every young couple should set up a home of their own.
sentences.chinese: 我們提倡所有的小兩口都能靠自己的雙手構建家園。

sentences.english: Place your hands on your hips and lower your butt until it's just above the seat.
sentences.chinese: 雙手放在臀部，慢慢下蹲到臀部剛好在椅子上方。

sentences.english: This frees our hands up for using tools.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就就解放了我們的雙手，去使用工具。

sentences.english: Her hands lay open in her lap and, loosely between them, a rosary .
sentences.chinese: 她的雙手攤開放在膝上，一串念珠鬆鬆地拿在手間。

sentences.english: If it’s going to attack, lie facedown, with your hands clasped behind your neck.
sentences.chinese: 如果它要襲擊你，面朝下躺下，雙手在頸後緊扣。

sentences.english: It shakes its arms like whips.
sentences.chinese: 它像鞭子一樣擺動雙手。

sentences.english: Then we hand in hand together, with our solidarity of hands.
sentences.chinese: 那麼我們攜手同心，用我們同舟共濟的雙手。

sentences.english: He clung to the rope with both hands.
His hands continued to clench and unclench.
sentences.chinese: 他的雙手反覆地攥緊又鬆開。

definition: to heave/to lift/to raise up/to uphold
to bow the head/to yield/to give in
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
